thread.title: Arsenal press conference live updates as Arsene Wenger faces the media ahead of West Brom trip
thread.title_full: Arsenal press conference live updates as Arsene Wenger faces the media ahead of West Brom trip

author: Joe Mewis
title: Arsenal press conference live updates as Arsene Wenger faces the media ahead of West Brom trip
text:
Sport Arsenal press conference live updates as Arsene Wenger faces the media ahead of West Brom trip The Gunners make the trip to the Hawthorns for Saturday's early kick-off - see what the boss has to say here Share Wenger is set to discuss all things West Brom (Photo: Stuart MacFarlane) Share 
Arsenal return to Premier League action this weekend after their FA Cup progression and Champions League exit with a trip to West Brom. 
Arsene Wenger is due up in front of the press at 9am to discuss the Saturday lunchtime clash and will no doubt be asked about his future and that of contract rebels Alexis Sanchez and Mesut Ozil as well as the usual rundown of injuries and other goings on at the Emirates. 
Find out what the Frenchman has to say here. 07:55 Some familiar faces in pre-season? 
Less than a week after being dumped out of the Champions League by Bayern Munich, Arsenal have announced that they are to take on the German giants once more. 
The Gunners will take on Bayern as part of their pre-season plans in the Far East this summer. 
Arsene Wengerâ€™s side were once more humiliated by the Bavarians last week, dumped out of the Champions League once more by the Bundesliga leaders. 
Bayern won both legs of their second round clash 5-1, resulting in a 10-2 aggregate victory and increasing the pressure on Wenger. 
Now the two will do battle again at the Shanghai Stadium in China on July 19.
